name: LD49: Change Is Inevitable
description:
Change is Inevitable! Fight your way through a dungeon where, if you go through a portal, your entire play style has to change!

There are three weapons:

 - Force Field: a yellow attack that has to charge up. Hits hard but has a long cooldown.

 - Hammer: a massive hammer that slams down on enemies, but like the Force Field, must charge up and has a long cooldown.

 - Sword: a light sword; less damage, but also less of a cooldown and no charge.

Navigate with WASD and attack with the mouse button; hold down mouse button to charge attacks, when applicable. Press escape to pause the game.

Enjoy!
